title: [Anthurium Way]
description: Small blue wildflowers grow among the tall grass and thorn bushes on both sides of the path.  The pungent smell of seawater drifts on the wind as a distant seagull navigates the air currents high above the ground.  A weather beaten sign, its writing illegible, has been discarded alongside the sandy walk.

Wildflowers grow among the tall grass and thorn bushes on both sides of the path.  The pungent smell of seawater drifts on the wind as a distant seagull navigates the air currents high above the ground.
